definition: all day long/the whole day/the whole time
surname Cheng
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month

sentences.english: How dirty can one woman get in her own bed?
sentences.chinese: 一個成日待在牀上的女人能由多髒？

sentences.english: Tired of the President's beady eyes starting at you all day in your government office?
sentences.chinese: 總統肖像成日目光如豆影響辦公室士氣怎辦？

sentences.english: You must be very tired after working all day.
sentences.chinese: 你做咗成日嘢，一定好癐嘞。

sentences.english: I haven't had sex for almost a year. Two days ago, I made love with my bf.
sentences.chinese: 太耐無做就一定會痛，甚至有幾天會成日想去小便。
